content: Yes, it's truly amazing to contemplate the vast changes that have already taken place in our world, and the even more remarkable ones that may lie ahead. While change can often be unsettling, it's important to remember that it is also a source of great opportunity and growth. We are fortunate to be living in such an exciting time of rapid technological advancement and expanding human knowledge, and hopefully, we will continue to use these innovations for the betterment of ourselves and our society. And as you said, it's comforting to know that we are here to witness and participate in these changes.
